H0.text: Which two countries took part in the short Kargil War in 1999. China-India

H1.text: Which two countries took part in the short Kargil War in 1999. Pakistan-Afghanistan

H2.text: Which two countries took part in the short Kargil War in 1999. India-Bangladesh

H3.text: Which two countries took part in the short Kargil War in 1999. Indo-Pak

A4.text: The Kargil War, was fought between India and Pakistan from May to July 1999 in the Kargil district of Ladakh

A5.text: The conflict was triggered by the infiltration of Pakistani troops—disguised as Kashmiri militants—into strategic positions on the Indian side of the LoC
